biotools.summary: AIDA: Ab Initio Domain Assembly Server attempts to find the best domain arrangements while maintaining chain connectivity. The server also supports structure assembly from sequence only and restraint-guided simulation producing a final assembly satisfying user-specified inter-domain distance restraints.
